name: Wiggin LLP
goal: Wiggin is a law firm focusing on media, technology and intellectual property, whose lawyers are experts in their fields. Wiggin provides legal, commercial and policy advice to national, European and international clients.
interests: Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Research and innovation, Single market, Sport, Taxation
euInitiatives: Legal services to clients in the field of EU law, including in particular copyright law, audiovisual regulation and competition.
customers: 21st Century Fox,Motion Picture Association,CBS Studios International
